channel.title: Need help with the following!
channel.description:
Okay, I'm making my server...
And as usual, There's problems.
I'm using winterlove and Galkons client base
1. I can edit galkons sprites, But theydon't change at all on the client. 2. I have a serious item null problem.
-Most of the items I have in turn into nulls, this seems to be from 07956+, They all turn into nulls when spawned. The rest are fine. The ones in the Class8.java don't turn into nulls instantly, but do if you say move an item, Wear it etc. If I have more than one item in the class8. in my invent - Moving something will change them all into nulls...
How do I fix this, I don't want all my items turning into nulls
I'll add my other questions later, Only if this null problem is fixed

item.title: Need help with the following!
item.dc:creator: @Hackerz Hackerz
item.description:
@Hackerz wrote:

  1. Try going to the bank and see if the srpites change there. alot of sprites dont show up untill you open a bank (make every sprite the same not just 1) so if you changes the magic book change all 2 or 3 magic books or you will not see them

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with the following!
item.dc:creator: @Husk Husk
item.description:
@Husk wrote:

Okay, I’m making my server…

And as usual, There’s problems.

I’m using winterlove and Galkons client base

  1. I can edit galkons sprites, But theydon’t change at all on the client.
  2. I have a serious item null problem.

-Most of the items I have in turn into nulls, this seems to be from 07956+, They all turn into nulls when spawned. The rest are fine. The ones in the Class8.java don’t turn into nulls instantly, but do if you say move an item, Wear it etc. If I have more than one item in the class8. in my invent - Moving something will change them all into nulls…

How do I fix this, I don’t want all my items turning into nulls

I’ll add my other questions later, Only if this null problem is fixed

Read full topic
